user_assist.summary: Follow-up session addressing worsening severe depressive symptoms (including early morning awakening, weight loss, and passive death ideation) four weeks after initiating Sertraline 50mg.
user_assist.reasoning: The session is a critical psychiatric follow-up focused on assessing the efficacy of current pharmacotherapy and managing acute, severe depressive symptoms including passive suicidal ideation. Safety content is clinical history required for risk assessment.
